<style>
    @media only screen and (min-width: 768px){
        .whatsapp-chat .hide-mobile {
            display: none
        }
    }
    @media only screen and (max-width: 767px){
        .whatsapp-chat .hide-web {
            display: none;
        }
    }
    .whatsapp-chat {
        position: fixed;
        z-index: 999;
        bottom: 110px;
        right: 10px;
    }

    .whatsapp-chat img {
        height: 70px;
        width: auto;
    }
</style>
